text_block_list.text: I was at the track one afternoon, there to observe, while the students were training hard.

One runner ran with a strong, sturdy style that caught my eye.
It was Fenomeno, the girl I met the other day.
With her powerful stride and stamina, it seemed to me she had the makings of a great stayer. She could even put up a good fight at the Twinkle Series, probably.
But the most striking thing about her running was the sense of sincerity I felt. As if her overflowing devotion to justice was given form――

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: WHAZZUUPPP!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hey hey hey! Ya got yer beans clean!? 
You're never gonna be an Elite Bean Agent if you keep runnin' like that, Mamechin!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
...Be― Be careful, Golshi-san!
Don't start running without warning!
What if you had hit me!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Pfft! If that's all it takes to freak you out, then you're all toast and no beans!
Neener neener neener~~~☆

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Ngh... Not only are you running recklessly, but you're engaging in unsportsmanlike conduct, too!
This is a violation! A violation, I say!!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
STOP          RIGHT           THERE!!
YOU'RE       UNDER         ARREST!!
...The girl with a big smile on her face was the school's notorious problem child, Gold Ship. It seems her arrival completely broke Fenomeno's concentration.
Their cat-and-mouse game looked like it would drag on for a while... I doubt I'd be able to see Fenomeno run with full focus any time soon.
After that, I started noticing Fenomeno around the school――

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
...I can smell it! The scent of crime...
Whoever you are, you can't escape the nose of the Disciplinary Committee!

Psst, you know that "good stuff"...?
...I got it.
text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Here you are!
――NGWHAAAA!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, we've got you now, Meno!
I knew you'd show up if we did some shady stuff!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Darn you―― You're in violation of noise rules!
And, indiscriminately engaging in suspicious behavior is obstruction of school duties! Stop this immediately!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
I can smell it... I can smell it...!
Wait, I literally smell it!? Is it coming from here!?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
It's you all again!?
It reeks of squid... Agh, what are you cooking in here?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Tsk, guess we're busted...
We're cookin' up some high-class dried squid. It's real good. Wanna try some?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: I do not! Put this all away immediately!!

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I do apologize for the smell. We'll deal with it right away.
...But we're only having a little gathering here, so could you please overlook this?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Ngh... Well, if you deal with the smell, then I suppose... Wait, no! That aside, taking advantages of school facilities like this is already against the rules!
――Every day, Fenomeno would be strung along by the troublemakers around her, just like that. It seems her honest, disciplined attitude made it hard for her to ignore them.
――One day, we hosted a tour of Tracen for the local primary school Umamusume, letting them watch the students train.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
We will now begin the tour of the campus training facilities.
All of you, make two orderly lines, and follow us.

text_block_list.name: Primary School Umamusume
text_block_list.text: R-right...!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hold up, are you kids feeling down or what?
C'mon, try and live it up a little! Giant squid style!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Golshi-san, please try refrain from your unserious antics!
We have to give them a proper tour!!

Gold Ship and Fenomeno were helping guide the kids along.
The kids took an immediate liking to the former, while getting scared of the latter... It was a little worrying.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: This workout machine is dangerous, so please refrain from touching it. This piece of equipment, however, is safe to try.

text_block_list.name: Primary School Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yay!!

The tour was going well up to that point. 
The plan was to head to the training track and show the kids a mock race...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Trainer!
I can't believe I have the oppurtunity to work with you... It's an honor!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Though it may not be as unbelievable as I said.
It's no surprise someone as excellent as you would help organize this tour.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Your consideration for the children's future shows your noble heart and righteous values... I'd be honored if you allowed me to follow your example!

...For some reason, she had a very positive image of me. 
A fairly romanticized one, though.

choice_data_list: Let's make this tour a good one.
Let's make this tour a good one.
text_block_list.text:
Well, she was spot on about my consideration for the kids. 
They were hoping to be racers one day, so I wanted to help them make the most out of this experience.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Yes!
I'm assigned to run in the mock race after this.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: I will do everything in my power to serve as a good example for the children!
...Eek.
text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume Child

text_block_list.text:
Fenomeno focused herself, forming an intense look in her eyes, which intimidated the children around her.
...Again, a little worrying.
